description.zh: 我们设计、原型制作和研究智能交互系统，用于真实场景中辅助和增强学习、教育、儿童及其家庭，以及弱势群体。
description.en: We design, prototype, and study intelligent, interactive systems for real-world settings to assist and augment learning, education, children and their families, and underprivileged groups.
